all.text: Bob Ross is painting the next page
all.subtext: He'll have the happy little trees trees done in a moment

all.text: 200 years ago it took Lewis and Clark several months to across the Country...
all.subtext: I'm taking to space, so give me a second.
This may take a moment or two.

all.text: Our micro-robot technicians are building the next page

all.subtext: We apologize for the wait, you can't rush perfection.

all.text: Like a timid ghost or a 1997 text message
all.subtext: This may take a moment to appear.
This may take a moment or two.
"Toto, I've got a feeling we're not in Kansas anymore."
